Package sprites

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
sprites.Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Platform, Player, Projectile
public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Aviral Vaidya, Kevin Ren The Sprite class represents a double precision sprite in Downfall which can be visualized using the processing library

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Sprite​(aviral.shapes.Shape s, double vx, double vy)
    alternate constructor for a sprite with just 1 life and no acceleration
    Sprite​(aviral.shapes.Shape s, double vx, double vy, double ax, double ay)
    alternate constructor for a sprite with just 1 life
    Sprite​(aviral.shapes.Shape s, double vx, double vy, double ax, double ay, int totalLives)
    Creates a sprite

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void draw​(processing.core.PApplet p)
    draws the sprite on the drawingsurface
    boolean isTouching​(Sprite other)
    checks if sprite is touching another sprite

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Sprite

      public Sprite​(aviral.shapes.Shape s, double vx, double vy, double ax, double ay, int totalLives)
      Creates a sprite
      Parameters:
      s - Shape of the sprite
      vx - x velocity of the sprite
      vy - y velocity of the sprite
      ax - x acceleration of the sprite
      ay - y acceleration of the sprite
      totalLives - total number of lives the sprite has

    • Sprite

      public Sprite​(aviral.shapes.Shape s, double vx, double vy)
      alternate constructor for a sprite with just 1 life and no acceleration
      Parameters:
      s - shape of the sprite
      vx - x velocity of the sprite
      vy - y velocity of the sprite

    • Sprite

      public Sprite​(aviral.shapes.Shape s, double vx, double vy, double ax, double ay)
      alternate constructor for a sprite with just 1 life
      Parameters:
      s - shape of the sprite
      vx - x velocity of the sprite
      vy - y velocity of the sprite
      ax - x acceleration of the sprite
      ay - y acceleration of the sprite

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet p)
      draws the sprite on the drawingsurface
      Parameters:
      p - surface for sprite to be drawn on
      Postcondition:
      Sprite is drawn on the surface

    • isTouching

      public boolean isTouching​(Sprite other)
      checks if sprite is touching another sprite
      Parameters:
      other - other sprite this sprite is checked against
      Returns:
      true if it is touching the other sprite, false otherwise
